mapper.select: SELECT t.tag_name, COUNT(pt.tag_id) AS tag_count FROM tag t JOIN post_tag pt ON t.tag_id = pt.tag_id GROUP BY t.tag_id ORDER BY tag_count DESC LIMIT 7
SELECT t.tag_id, t.tag_name FROM tag t JOIN post_tag pt ON t.tag_id = pt.tag_id WHERE pt.post_id = #{postId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POST_TAG (post_id, tag_id) VALUES (#{postId}, #{tagId}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE post_tag_id = post_tag_id
